Sentence.sentence: The court eventually freed Jackson after the police found the man who had really committed the crimes.

Sentence.sentence: Eyewitnesses to other crimes have identified the wrong person in a police lineup or in photographs

Sentence.sentence: The questions the police ask witnesses also have an effect on them.

Sentence.sentence: This responsibility takes her to many different places every week——the police station, the court and the hospital.

Sentence.sentence: Flight attendants, firefighters, and police officers have to be over a certain height, and be physically fit.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: He reported the case to the police and then sat there, lost and lonely in strange city, thinking of the terrible troubles of getting all the paperwork organized again.

Sentence.sentence: Then, Larry asked the police if he was needed or free to go.

Sentence.sentence: In Arizona v.United States,the majority overturned three of the four contested provisions of Arizona's controversial plan to have state and local police enforce federal immigration law.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: However,the Justices said that Arizona police would be allowed to verify the legal status of people who come in contact with law enforcement.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The court, though, may want to allow room for police to cite situations where they are entitled to more freedom.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The court has ruled that police don’t violate the Fourth Amendment when they sift through the wallet or pocketbook of an arrestee without a warrant.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Just how much does the Constitution protect your digital data? The Supreme Court will now consider whether police can search the contents of a mobile phone without a warrant if the phone is on or around a person during an arrest.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Enough of the implications are discernable, even obvious, so that the justices can and should provide updated guidelines to police, lawyers and defendants.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Enough of the implications are discernible, even obvious, so that the justices can and should provide updated guidelines to police, lawyers and defendants.
Sentence.come: 2015年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: However, the Justices said that Arizona police would be allowed to verify the legal status of people who come in contact with law enforcement.
Sentence.come: 2013年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: The court has ruled that police don't violate the Fourth Amendment when they go through the wallet or pocketbook of an arrestee without a warrant.

means.word_mean: 警察部门; 警方; 警察

sentences.en: Several police hurried out in their police car.
sentences.cn: 几个警察坐着警车匆忙地赶出去了。

entry.def: The police are the official organization that is responsible for making sure that people obey the law.
entry.tran: 警察部门；警察机关；警方

example.ex: The police are also looking for a second car...
example.tran: 警方也在寻找另一辆车。

example.ex: Police say they have arrested twenty people following the disturbances...
example.tran: 警方说骚乱发生后他们已逮捕了20人。

entry.def: Police are men and women who are members of the official organization that is responsible for making sure that people obey the law.

example.ex: More than one hundred police have ringed the area.
example.tran: 这一地区已被上百名警察包围。

entry.def: If the police or military forces police an area or event, they make sure that law and order is preserved in that area or at that event.

example.ex: ...the tiny UN observer force whose job it is to police the border...
example.tran: 承担守卫边界职责的一小支联合国观察员部队
出动了大批警察维持游行示威的秩序。

entry.def: If a person or group in authority polices a law or an area of public life, they make sure that what is done is fair and legal.

example.ex: ...IMRO, the self-regulatory body that polices the investment management business.
example.tran: 投资管理监管组织，监督投资管理业务的自律机构

means.word_mean: 1. the force of policemen and officers;
1. maintain the security of by carrying out a control

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent. (in the sense 'public order'): from French, from medieval Latin politia 'citizenship, government' (see policy). Current senses date from the early 19th cent

sentences.cn: 一名男子被警方逮捕并拘押讯问。

sentences.cn: 滚出这所房子，不然我就叫警察了。

sentences.cn: 边境将由联合国官员巡查。

sentences.cn: 这个行业由其自律机构监督。

sentences.cn: 警方也在寻找另一辆车。

sentences.en: ...the tiny UN observer force whose job it is to police the border...

sentences.cn: 出动了大批警察维持游行示威的秩序。
sentences.en: The march was heavily policed.

sentences.cn: 投资管理监管组织，监督投资管理业务的自律机构
sentences.en: ...IMRO, the self-regulatory body that polices the investment management business.

sentences.cn: 警察是法律和秩序的护卫者.
sentences.en: The police are guardians of law and order.

sentences.cn: 几个恶棍逐渐将他团团围住时,几十个警察到了.
sentences.en: Dozens of police arrived as the hoodlums closed in on him.

sentences.cn: 所有市民都应该帮助警察追捕罪犯.
sentences.en: All citizens should help the police in tracking the criminals down.

sentences.cn: 警察设法制住了那个囚犯的反抗.
sentences.en: The police tried to break down the prisoner's opposition.

sentences.cn: 警察用警犬来追踪罪犯.
sentences.en: The police used dogs to track the criminal.

sentences.cn: 警察盘问了那个嫌疑分子.
sentences.en: The police quizzed the suspect.

sentences.cn: 警方把罪犯投入监狱.
sentences.en: The police put the culprit in jail.

sentences.cn: 警察驱散了骚乱的人群.
sentences.en: The police scattered the disorderly crowd.

sentences.cn: 警察询问了证人.
sentences.en: The police questioned the witness.

sentences.cn: 新法律给予警察搜查私人住宅的权利。
sentences.en: The new law empowered the police to search private house.

sentences.cn: 尽管墨西哥没有类似哥伦比亚游击队势力的问题, 但是她也缺乏像哥伦比亚一样全国性的高效警察部门.
sentences.en: Mexico may lack Colombia's guerrillas, but it also lacks Colombia's reasonably effective national police force.

sentences.cn: 从经济危机开始以来,在西班牙国家警察部门申请职位的人数是原来的三倍.
sentences.en: Applications for posts in Spain's national police force tripled since the crisis began.

sentences.cn: 这种状况已造成整个警察部门的为难尴尬.
sentences.en: This situation has become an embarrassment for the entire police department.

sentences.cn: 洛杉矶警察部门计划今年部署这种设备.
sentences.en: The Los Angeles Police Department plans to deploy the system this year.

sentences.cn: 莫斯科地方警察部门不肯接听寻求解释的电话.
sentences.en: Moscow region police did not answer phone calls seeking comment.

sentences.cn: 同时,里约热内卢的警察部门也难辞其咎.
sentences.en: Rio's police force is also part of the problem.

sentences.cn: 警察部门追捕逃跑的窃贼,终于把他逮住了.
sentences.en: The police chased the escaping thief and caught him at last.

sentences.cn: 市长候选人答应清洗警察部门.
sentences.en: The mayoral candidate has promised to purge the police department.

sentences.cn: 法国的警察部门; 宪兵或警官的总称.
sentences.en: French police force; a group of gendarmes or gendarmes collectively.

sentences.cn: 美国华盛顿州的西雅图警察部门在80年代末期建立了自行车巡逻队.
sentences.en: Bicycle Police In Seattle, Washington, the police department instituted bicycle patrols in the late 1980 s.

sentences.cn: 你盗窃了我们警察部门搜集的用于调查一宗杀人案件的证据.
sentences.en: You stole police department evidence in a homicide investigation.

sentences.cn: 有几家报纸声称该市警察部门腐败。
sentences.en: Several newspapers made allegations of corruption in the city's police department.

sentences.cn: 全州所有机构和警察部门已经开始行动了。
sentences.en: The full state and police machinery ground into action.

sentences.cn: 更多的平民在为警察部门工作，使得警员从文案中解脱出来。
sentences.en: There were more civilians working for the police, freeing officers from desk jobs.

sentences.cn: 在亚利桑那州政府与联邦政府的较量中，亚利桑那州让州和当地警方实施联邦移民法的这项计划备受争议，由于大部分人反对，其四项法律条款中的三项被推翻。
sentences.en: In Arizona v. United States, the majority overturned three of the four contested provisions of Arizona’s controversial plan to have state and local police enforce federal immigration law.

sentences.cn: 这些足够多的潜在影响是可以观察到的，甚至是显而易见的，因此法官能够也应该给警方、律师和被告提供最新的法律指导。
sentences.en: Enough of the implications are discernible, even obvious, so that the justices can and should provide updated guidelines to police, lawyers and defendants.

sentences.cn: 法院已裁定,警方在没有搜查证的情况下,仔细检查被捕者的钱包或皮夹并不违反宪法第四条修正案。
sentences.en: The court has ruled that police don’t violate the Fourth Amendment when they sift through the wallet or pocketbook of an arrestee without a warrant.

sentences.cn: 尽管如此，最高法院或许还想要为警方引证有权行使更多自主行为的情形留下空间。
sentences.en: The court, though, may want to allow room for police to cite situations where they are entitled to more freedom.

sentences.en: The witness was delivered to court under the protection of the police.

sentences.en: Initial investigation showed that there was a student pilot aboard the plane, police said.

sentences.en: The police drummed up new methods of dealing with urban crime.

sentences.cn: 警方料想足球赛后会发生各种各样的麻烦.
sentences.en: The police contemplated various kinds of trouble after the football match.

sentences.cn: 但本周,日本首都的警方开始了对列车性骚扰的打击.
sentences.en: But this week the Japanese capital's police launched a crackdown on scourge of groping.

sentences.cn: 诺克斯维尔警方表示开枪的高中生已被拘留,他使用的枪支已找到.
sentences.en: Knoxville police say they have the shooter in custody and have recovered the gun he used.

sentences.cn: 一位警方调查员正等待他苏醒.
sentences.en: A police inspector was waiting for him to recover consciousness.

sentences.cn: 我认为, 是意大利警方的做法 ( 应该受到指责 ).
sentences.en: I think the approach from the Italian police was ( to blame ), in my opinion.

sentences.cn: 他惹事落到了警方手里(如被捕了).
sentences.en: He got into trouble with the police, eg was arrested.

sentences.cn: 滚出这所房子，不然我就叫警察了。
sentences.en: Get out of the house or I'll call the police .

sentences.cn: 数以百计的警察身披防暴装备，奋力镇压暴乱。
sentences.en: Hundreds of police in riot gear struggled to control the violence.

sentences.cn: 这一地区已被上百名警察包围。
sentences.en: More than one hundred police have ringed the area.

sentences.cn: 出动了大批警察维持游行示威的秩序。
sentences.en: The march was heavily policed.

sentences.en: The Supreme Court will now consider whether police can search the contents of a mobile phone without a warrant if the phone is on or around a person during an arrest.

sentences.en: M:  I am not sure I want to change rules,  but  I’d  like  the  police  to  be  stricter  on  the  roads.

sentences.cn: 很多人顺便过来帮助她们，包括新墨西哥州的警察们，最后总共帮她们筹到了568美元，奥尔雷德之后才知道这件事。

sentences.cn: 警察到来之前,他们一直在往树林里倒拉圾.
sentences.en: They kept dumping their garbage in the woods until the local police came.

sentences.cn: 在大街上无照经营的小摊贩们总是游移不定的,以免被警察抓住.
sentences.en: The vendors without proper licenses are always nervous in the street in case police caught them.

sentences.cn: 当警察赶到时,示威的人群逐渐散去了.
sentences.en: The crowd of demonstrators away when the police arrived.

sentences.cn: 警察就被偷的汽车一事向他提问.
sentences.en: The police questioned him about the stolen car.

sentences.cn: 警察一到, 我们就急忙离开了那里.
sentences.en: Once the police arrived, we hotfooted it out of there.

sentences.cn: 警察在寻究事情的起因, 大家都沉默.
sentences.en: When the police inquired about the cause of the matter, everyone remained silent.

sentences.cn: 警察在严密跟捬他.
sentences.en: The police are hard on his heels.

sentences.cn: 这绝不保证警察们会客客气气的.
sentences.en: This by no means guarantees gentle treatment by the police.

sentences.cn: 我们向警察提出起诉.
sentences.en: We lodged a complaint with the police.

sentences.cn: 劫案之后, 警察局长过来问了些问题.
sentences.en: After the robbery, the chief of police came to ask some questions.

sentences.cn: 上周市里的警察已经连续调查了10起强奸案.
sentences.en: Police in the town have investigated 10 cases of assault in the past week.

sentences.cn: 警察和法医正在勘查现场.
sentences.en: Police and medical examiner are investigating the scene.

sentences.cn: 对许多人来说,警察当局决定不起诉蒋卓烽似乎是常识类的事.
sentences.en: To most people the Police decision not to charge Mr Zhuo Feng Jiang seems like commonsense.

sentences.cn: 同时也通知了警察.
sentences.en: In the meantime the police were notified.

sentences.cn: 我要向警察告发你行骗.
sentences.en: I will report you to the police for committing a fraud.

sentences.cn: 重庆将有至少3000名警察面临大换岗.
sentences.en: At least 3000 police officials in Chongqing are facing a major reshuffle.

sentences.cn: 外交官被置于警察的监视之下.
sentences.en: The diplomat was placed under police surveillance.

sentences.cn: 治安总是会成为暴力的事情,并不优雅.
sentences.en: Policing always going to be a violent thing.

sentences.cn: 该地带由联合国部队维持治安.
sentences.en: The zone was policed by United Nations forces.

sentences.cn: 镇上治安情况良好.
sentences.en: The town is well policed.

sentences.cn: 警察来把他们带走了, 因为他们扰乱治安.
sentences.en: The police came and took them away, because they were causing a disturbance.

sentences.cn: 当地公安 、 消防 、 治安等多个部门的人员纷纷赶到.
sentences.en: Local police, fire, security and other departments who have arrived.

sentences.cn: 警方必须努力恢复治安.
sentences.en: The police must try to restore order.

sentences.cn: 对于治安是如何维护的,这件事情上她比大多数人都有发言权.
sentences.en: That is more say than most people have in how they are policed.

sentences.cn: 美国不能维持全世界热点地区的治安.
sentences.en: The United States cannot police all of the world's hot spots.

sentences.cn: 社会治安综合治理: 大力改革和实施社区警务战略.
sentences.en: Comprehensive management of social order: to reform and implementation of community policing strategies.
